title: Loccie—navigation without maps
summary: Smart compass navigation for urban and outdoor hiking, travel and cycling
description: Loccie takes you where you want to be while helping you explore along the way. It's smart compass navigation made for urban hikers, curious travelers, casual cyclists and outdoor lovers — and works like this:1. Search for your destination2. Let Loccie navigate you, on your smartwatch or phone3. Explore and experience new adventures!Loccie uses a simple interface that directs you to your destination with colours — the closer you are, the warmer the colour gets. It's instant, fun and super easy!Features:• optimized for Android Wear smartwatches• search for an address or point of interest• perfect for urban and outdoor exploration when walking, hiking or cycling • does not require a special account, email or subscription  • easy-to-use, game-like navigation interface • uses GPS • makes navigation easy, simple and fun    Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Loccie and talk to us at whatsup@loccie.com!
descriptionHTML:
Loccie takes you where you want to be while helping you explore along the way. It's smart compass navigation made for urban hikers, curious travelers, casual cyclists and outdoor lovers — and works like this:
1. Search for your destination
2. Let Loccie navigate you, on your smartwatch or phone
3. Explore and experience new adventures!

Loccie uses a simple interface that directs you to your destination with colours — the closer you are, the warmer the colour gets. It's instant, fun and super easy!

Features:
• optimized for Android Wear smartwatches
• search for an address or point of interest
• perfect for urban and outdoor exploration when walking, hiking or cycling
• does not require a special account, email or subscription
• easy-to-use, game-like navigation interface
• uses GPS
• makes navigation easy, simple and fun

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Loccie and talk to us at whatsup@loccie.com!
comments: Not working The user interface doesn't feel smooth. There is no autocompletion for the destination input. On my Moto 360 the app crashes instantly when I try to launch it.
I love it! Very simple, user friendly and useful :)
